CustomField.description: The time entry mode to use when entering task time for a timecard row. You can choose one of these values: Adjust up, Current, Calculated, or Freeform. The default value is Current.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The time entry mode to use when entering task time for a timecard row. You can choose one of these values: Adjust up, Current, Calculated, or Freeform. The default value is Current.
CustomField.label: Task Time Entry Mode
